name: ControlVanillaSFX
description: Control the volume of SFX from vanilla GD separately from the volume of SFX from a level's SFX triggers.

volume.name: Volume
volume.description: Set the volume of vanilla SFX (as a percentage).

volumeBoost.name: Volume Boost
volumeBoost.description:
This setting boosts the volume of vanilla SFX by the value you set here.

By using any other value besides the default of 1.0 for this setting, you hold yourself responsible for any resulting damages (including but not limited to hearing loss).
